summary.description:
a fast and memory-efficient tool for rare cell type identification.

Rare cell identification tool for single cell datasets.

GiniClust is a clustering method specifically designed for rare cell type detection.

||| NAME (GiniClust3) SIMILAR TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/giniclust2 (GiniClust2), bio.tools/giniclust (GiniClust)
summary.name: GiniClust3
